more_content:
The most colorful and inclusive celebration of the year returns to New York City, but 2019 is different in many ways. First, this year signifies the 50th anniversary of the Stonewall Uprising, a turning moment in the LGBTQIA+ history. Second, the celebration will take place throughout the entire month of June. Read on to find out more.

Anniversary of the Stonewall Uprising

The Stonewall Uprising took place on June 28, 1969, after the police raided the Stonewall Inn in Greenwich Village. This act was part of a series of ongoing raids that targeted New York’s underground gay community, but for the first time, the community members joined and fought back. The episode came to be known as the Stonewall Riots and later as the Stonewall Uprising, which became the launchpad for annual movements.

Main Events

In commemoration of the 50th anniversary of the Stonewall Uprising, World Pride NYC will host over 50 events throughout the city. You can choose from parties, conferences, family-friendly events, art exhibits, cultural performances and concerts.

Let’s start with the marches and rallies taking place in the streets of New York:

Rally: Stonewall 50 Commemoration
Date: June 28, 2019 from 6pm to 10pm

Youth Pride
Date: June 29, 2019 from 12pm to 6pm

NYC Pride March
Date: June 30, 2019 at 12pm

One of the events we, at The New Yorker Hotel, are looking forward to the most is Masterbeat One World, a weekend long party. As the event’s official hotel, by booking your room at The New Yorker Hotel you’ll be able to go straight from your room to the parties at Manhattan Center in just a few minutes!

Masterbeat One World is made up of five ticketed events featuring 12 Superstar DJs starting on Thursday, June 27, 2019 and ending on Sunday, June 30, 2019. Tickets are already on sale and they sell out fast!

One Dream. One WorldPride Opening Party
Date: June 27, 2019 from 10pm to 4am
Location: Marquee, 289 10th Avenue, New York, NY 10001

Forever: Love. One WorldPride Opening Party
Date: June 28, 2019 at 10pm
Location: Hammerstein Ballroom, 314 West 34th Street, New York, NY 10001

USS Masterbeat Tea Dance. One WorldPride Daytime Party: Rooftop & Club
Date: June 29, 2019 from 2pm to 8pm
Location: Terminal 5: Rooftop & Club, 610 West 56th Street, New York, NY 10019

Masterbeat One World. WorldPride Main Event
Date: June 29, 2019 at 10pm
Location: Hammerstein Ballroom, 314 West 34th Street, New York, NY 10001

Matinee: Pervert. One WorldPride Closing Party
Date: June 30, 2019 at 10pm
Location: Terminal 5: Rooftop & Club, 610 West 56th Street, New York, NY 10019

Are you eager to participate in more events? Then, visit the official website to take a look and the full World Pride NYC event calendar.
